entries.title: Winklevoss firm charged in US over crypto sales
entries.description: Its partner company is also accused of illegal sales to hundreds of thousands of investors.

entries.title: Tesla cuts prices by up to a fifth to boost demand
entries.description: The electric car maker is reducing prices by thousands of pounds as global downturn threatens sales.

entries.title: Apple boss Tim Cook to have pay cut by over 40% this year
entries.description: The technology giant's chief executive Tim Cook has faced criticism from investors over his salary.

entries.title: India targets China's dominance in mobile phones
entries.description: There's some way to go, but India hopes to build its own world-class mobile phone industry.
